channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- FlatPM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- FlatPM

item.title: CVE-2022-3934|2024-08-03T01:27:53.042Z -- unknown -- flatpm
item.description: The FlatPM WordPress plugin before 3.0.13 does not sanitise and escape some parameters before outputting them back in pages, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
